COMMENT_TX: $with a 3-2 count on Johnny Bench, Athletics manager Dick Williams signalled to intentionally walk Bench; catcher Gene Tenace held out his hand as Rollie Fingers came to the set position, but, per the plan, Fingers threw a slider for strike three
